message: Is there anything that will allow me to run a python script without any extra installations? For example, I want to be able to copy over a file from a USB and run it on a new computer without any intial setup or anything, everything is all inclusive in that file/folder
py2exe py2app cx_freeze or portable python
For Windows, Michael Foord's Movable Python: http://www.voidspace.org.uk/python/movpy/
PyInstaller for linux and osx for cli apps, py2exe windows
That will depends on what OS you are targeting
On Linux and OS X, Python is installed by default you'll just need your sript on a USB key. Play it safe though and make sure it can run on versions as old as Python 2.4
On Windows, Python is not installed by default. You can use py2exe to create an exe file by it won't run natively on Linux or OS X.
